name: Tank Wars! (AstraGamesStudios)
description:
Hey Guys this is a temp prototype for a game jam i joined (my first jam ever! 😅)! it has a lot of bugs and can hardly be considered  a game! This is a multiplayer, so you have to get a partner to play with you! (you can play alone if you want, but it might get boring 😜) the goal is to destroy the other tank before you get destroyed!!! I hope you all like it!

I had very little time to work on it (just moved), but i had fun doing it! Enjoy!

Cheers!

P.S. i tried to upload it so you could play it on the browser, but when i tested it, it said the file was too large! 😕 sorry about that! But it still works for normal downloading! Anyway, tell me if you think i should continue with the project in the comments! 😁 Cheers!
